{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WAP54GP |revision=E |upc=745883560387 |asin=B000BWBU4C |manuf_country= |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WAPD-113G |manuf_rev= |availability=EoL |fcc_date=03/22/2005 |fcc_id=Q87-WAP54GPE, Q87-HGA9NWAP54GPE |ic_id=3839A-WAP54GPE |type=access point |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=Ethernet (PoE) |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Intel XScale |cpu1_model=IXP425;GWIXP425BDT; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=TE28F640J3C-120 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Dynachips |ram1_model=D98SD12816AH-6 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Gemtek WMIR-103GW |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2560 |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2525 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-N-Female |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Kendin |eth_chip2_model=KS8721B |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.245 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:18:F8 |oui_eth=00:18:F8 }} {{TagLine|2.4GHz Wireless-G Exterior Access Point}}
*OEM: [[Gemtek]] WAPD-113G (WAPD-113G_V02)
Some sources seem to indicate the device has a RP-N-Male plug, device :is shown in FCC documents as having a RP-N-Female jack. I am assuming the FCC documents are correct.
This device has an additional FCC ID: Q87-HGA9NWAP54GPE :(HGA9N, high gain antenna).
Additional specifications, per the FCC manual, follow... *Dimensions: [[Dimensions::163 mm x 205 mm x 55 mm]] *Weight: [[Weight::1.14 kg]]
Default settings are per the FCC manual. They may not be accurate. :The default SSID may be '''linksys'''.
